content: You can disable the title of the current section/room/folder.

comment.text: The "ManagerTitleDescription" translation key is used to describe the tooltip content that appears next to a button or label in certain UI elements, explaining the purpose of disabling section/folder titles. It appears in developer tools and room settings pages, where users can toggle this feature on/off. Translators should provide an equivalent description for users in other languages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "disable" is better translated as "bağlamaq" or "dayandırmaq" rather than "söndürmək". "Söndürmək" implies extinguishing or turning off completely, which might not be the intended meaning of disabling a title.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cari bölmə/otaq/qovluğun başlığını bağlaya bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Можете да деактивирате заглавието на текущия раздел/стая/папка" is a literal translation but may not be the most natural or clear way to express the original meaning in Bulgarian. 'Deactivate' can sound a bit technical or abrupt in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more user-friendly phrasing like "Можете да скриете заглавието на текущия раздел/стая/папка." or "Можете да премахнете заглавието на текущия раздел/стая/папка."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'vypnout' implies 'to turn off' or 'disable'. While functionally similar to 'disable' in this context, it carries a slightly different connotation. A more precise translation might be 'zakázat' (to prohibit/disable) or 'vypnout zobrazení' (turn off the display).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Název aktuální sekce/místnosti/složky můžete zakázat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'la salle/le dossier' is a literal translation of 'section/room/folder' and might sound awkward in French.  It doesn't convey the nuance of what a 'room' or 'folder' represents in a digital context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous pouvez désactiver le titre de la section, de l'espace ou du dossier actuel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, using 'de la section/de l'espace/du dossier' is slightly more formal than necessary. A more conversational tone might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous pouvez désactiver le titre de la section, de l'espace ou du dossier actuel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'Դուք կարող եք անջատել ընթացիկ բաժնի/սենյակի/թղթապանակի վերնագիրը:' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like: "Մեկ կտիվ բաժանելու/սենյակի/ֆայլի վերնագիրը" or "Դուք կարող եք հեռացնել ընթացիկ բաժնի/սենյակի/ֆայլի վերնագիրը:"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "現在のセクション/ルーム/フォルダのタイトルを無効にすることができます" is technically correct but sounds slightly unnatural and overly formal for a user-facing description. "無効にする" (mukyou ni suru) is a more technical term. A more natural phrasing would be something like "現在のセクション/ルーム/フォルダのタイトルを非表示にすることができます" or "現在のセクション/ルーム/フォルダのタイトルを消すことができます".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 現在のセクション/ルーム/フォルダのタイトルを非表示にすることができます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ປິດການທໍາງານ" (pid gan tham ngan) literally translates to "disable the function." While understandable, a more natural translation for "disable the title" might be "ເຊົາໃຊ້ຫົວຂໍ້" (sao sai hua kho) or similar, depending on the desired nuance. "ປິດການທໍາງານ" is more commonly used for functions or services.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານສາມາດເຊົາໃຊ້ຫົວຂໍ້ຂອງພາກສ່ວນ / ຫ້ອງ / folder ປະຈຸບັນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The slash '/' is used consistently between 'ພາກສ່ວນ', 'ຫ້ອງ', and 'folder'. Consider whether this is the intended style or if a different separator (e.g., comma) would be more appropriate based on Lao language conventions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No suggestion - Style choice, but review consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'mapes' is a possible misspelling. It should be 'mapes'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: mapes

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be slightly improved for better flow in Latvian. While grammatically correct, it feels a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jūs varat izslēgt pašreizējās sadaļas, telpas vai mapes nosaukumu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Você pode desativar o título da seção/sala/pasta atual' is a literal translation that doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'disable'. A more natural translation would convey the ability to hide or remove the title.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você pode ocultar o título da seção/sala/pasta atual.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Puteţi' (formal 'you') might be too formal for a user interface.  'Poţi' (informal 'you') might be more appropriate depending on the overall tone of the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Poţi dezactiva titlul secțiunei/sălii/folderului actual.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ඔබට වත්මන් කොටසේ/කාමරයේ/බහාලුමේ සිරැසිය අබල කිරීමට හැකිය." is not the most natural or accurate translation of "You can disable the title of the current section/room/folder." The word 'සිරැසිය' (siriya) typically refers to 'restriction' or 'detention,' not 'title.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation could be: "ඔබට වත්මන් කොටසේ/කාමරයේ/බහාලුමේ හිගිලි අබල කිරීමට හැකිය." (Obata watman kotase/kamaranaye/bahalume higil abala kirimata kayathiya.)  or "ඔබට වත්මන් කොටසේ/කාමරයේ/බහාලුමේ නම අබල කිරීමට හැකිය." (Obata watman kotase/kamaranaye/bahalume nama abala kirimata kayathiya.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Môžete deaktivovať názov aktuálnej sekcie/miestnosti/priečinka' is a literal translation but could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Slovak. 'Deaktivovať názov' isn't the most common way to express disabling a title. It's understandable, but sounds a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Môžete vypnúť názov aktuálnej sekcie/miestnosti/priečinka.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'онемогуц́ите' is a valid word, but a more natural and common phrasing would be 'искључите'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: искључите

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fascikle' is a less common and potentially unclear word choice. While technically correct, 'datoteke' or 'foldera' might be more understandable to a wider audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete da onemogućite naslov trenutnog odeljka/sobe/datoteke.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Geçerli bölümün/odanın/klasörün başlığını devre dışı bırakabilirsiniz' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. While technically correct, it doesn't flow as naturally as it could in Turkish. 'You can disable...' sounds slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mevcut bölümün/odanın/klasörün başlığını kapatabilirsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the use of slashes is acceptable, using a more fluid connective word might improve readability for a Turkish speaker.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mevcut bölüm, oda veya klasörün başlığını kapatabilirsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "vô hiệu hóa" (disable) is technically correct but sounds somewhat formal and clunky in this context. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'turning off' or 'hiding'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể tắt/ẩn tiêu đề của phần/phòng/thư mục hiện tại.
